name: Splitty the Dragons
description:
The 2-headed puzzle dungeon crawler with a twist.

For the best experience, don't go full screen.

WASD / Arrow Keys - Move Green Dragon / Move Purple Dragon

Left Shift / Right Shift / Space - Attack

F - Combine / Separate Dragons

----------------
